entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
